statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE last_purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, total_purchases FROM customers ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 1000 ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_purchases FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY total_purchases DESC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE total_purchases < 5000 AND email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY total_purchases ASC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_purchases FROM customers ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM segments ORDER BY segment_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customers WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customers WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT segment_name FROM segments WHERE segment_description LIKE '%premium%' ORDER BY segment_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers WHERE purchase_amount >= 500 AND purchase_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, purchase_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers c JOIN segments s ON c.customer_id = s.segment_id WHERE c.purchase_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfile;
SELECT name, email FROM CustomerProfile WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, total_purchases FROM CustomerProfile WHERE total_purchases > 1000;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount, items_purchased FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE total_amount >= 50 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfile;
SELECT name, city FROM CustomerProfile ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT name, email, total_purchases FROM CustomerProfile WHERE total_purchases > 1000;
SELECT segment_name, criteria FROM CustomerSegment WHERE segment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(total_amount) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM Customers c JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id;

SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, s.quantity, s.sale_amount FROM Customers c JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN Sales s ON o.order_id = s.order_id JOIN Products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM segments WHERE segment_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Ave%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00 AND price < 100.00 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT o.order_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT c.first_name, o.order_date, oi.quantity, oi.item_price FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id WHERE c.customer_id = 2;
